function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Racial segregation and lower housing standards leading to health burden on children","Impact":"Increased risk of health issues such as asthma for disadvantaged children","Mitigation":"Improve housing standards, reduce exposure to pollutants, and provide better healthcare access","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, pollution monitoring devices, and telemedicine","People":"Children from low-income families, particularly African American children","Owner":"Government, housing authorities, and healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Children studying in schools near highways exposed to hazardous pollutants","Impact":"Higher rates of respiratory symptoms and asthma in children","Mitigation":"Implement air filtration systems, relocate schools to less traffic-exposed areas, and improve ventilation","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, pollution monitoring devices, and urban planning solutions","People":"Children studying in schools near highways","Owner":"Government, school districts, and urban planners"},{"Description":"Inadequate working conditions for laborers and employees in blue collar jobs","Impact":"Health issues due to inadequate working conditions and lack of amenities","Mitigation":"Improve working conditions, provide better facilities, and ensure environmental control","Technologies":"HVAC systems, task lighting controls, and workplace safety monitoring devices","People":"Laborers and employees in blue collar jobs","Owner":"Employers, government regulators, and workplace safety organizations"}]}
